description: This file contains the main application component for a Tic Tac Toe game, utilizing React for UI rendering. It defines the Square, Board, and App components, managing game state and interactions.

methods.name: Square({ value, onClick })
methods.description: A functional component that represents a square on the Tic Tac Toe board, accepting props for its value and click handler.

methods.name: Board({ squares, onClick })
methods.description: A functional component that renders the Tic Tac Toe board, mapping over the squares array and rendering Square components.

methods.name: calculateWinner(squares)
methods.description: A utility function that determines the winner of the Tic Tac Toe game based on the current squares configuration.

methods.name: App()
methods.description: The main component that manages the game state, handles player interactions, and renders the overall UI of the game.

methods.name: handleClick
methods.description: Handles the clicking of a square, updates the game state to reflect the current player's move.

methods.name: resetGame
methods.description: Resets the game state to its initial configuration, allowing players to start a new game.
